section.title:
count slips by warehouse
warehouses count slips in Count Slips by Warehouse
section.para: To view a display of Count Slips by Warehouse, select the "Count Slips by Warehouse" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Count Slips by Warehouse, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Count Slips for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Count Slips you want to display.
Count Slips entered on and after this date will be displayed.
Count Slips entered on and before this date will be displayed.
Select to display unposted Count Tags.

Select to treat Count Slip numbers as numeric. If selected, the display will treat existing Count Slips as if they were created in a numerical sequence. If numbers are missing from the sequence, the display will indicate the missing Count Slip numbers in red type.
Display lists Count Slips by Warehouse, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
